TopicTitle: Mods to help the game look better...

Articles.Content:
Can I get a suggestion on what mods to install to make the game look better? I use CKAN and the game version is 1.12.5.

Keep in mind that my laptop has only 16gb RAM and an in-built graphics card. Something better than nothing. My lap overheats very fast so stick to the resource conservative mods.

I already have some mods installed like PlanetShine, Restock, Module Manager, Waterfall and Pood's Milky Way galaxy skybox.

All suggestions accepted and thanked for...

Just dont install the historical Kerbal heads mod

and also maybe dont install TU if you want your computer to stay un-melted

If you want some good lower-end visual mods, you can never go wrong with Stock Visual Enhancements (SVE). Of course, if you want a good atmosphere too, Spectra without Scatterer looks really good. I don’t suggest having both mods at once, because the game looks quite cluttered afterwords.
